abstract: Authorities arrest nine people in connection with suspected price-fixing scheme for Israeli high school groups visiting Holocaust sites in Poland.
lead_paragraph: The arrests were made in connection with a suspected price-fixing scheme for high school trips to former Nazi camps in Poland, the Israeli police said.

headline.main: 9 Are Arrested as Israeli Police Investigate Holocaust Trip Price-Fixing
headline.print_headline: Israel Charges Holocaust Tours in Price-Fixing

snippet: The arrests were made in connection with a suspected price-fixing scheme for high school trips to former Nazi camps in Poland, the Israeli police said.
